content: lion brand pattern # 70776ad skill level easy a 830-132 cotton-ease cactus 2 balls b 240-204 sock-ease yarn lemon drop 1 ball crochet hook - size p-15 10 mm crochet hook - size h-8 5 mm *for flowers* scarf is worked lengthwise in single_crochet in a flowers are worked in rounds in b make as many flowers as desired sew onto scarf to finish
